Name: Peacock Stew
Description: The meat is tender and juicy, the vegetables are also great.

DescriptionLocalization.es: La carne es tierna y jugosa, las verduras también son geniales.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 고기가 부드럽고 육즙이 풍부하고 야채도 훌륭합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Das Fleisch ist zart und saftig, das Gemüse ist auch super.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: La viande est tendre et juteuse, les légumes sont également excellents.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A hús puha és lédús, a zöldségek is remekek.
DescriptionLocalization.it: La carne è tenera e succosa, ottime anche le verdure.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 肉は柔らかくてジューシーで、野菜も素晴らしいです。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: A carne é macia e suculenta, os legumes também estão ótimos.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Мясо нежное и сочное, овощи тоже отличные.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Etler yumuşak ve sulu, sebzeler de harika.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 肉又嫩又多汁，蔬菜也很棒。
